buildArtifacts.build_cmd: export NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' && export IS_DEVELOPMENT_PREVIEW='false' && npx jambo build && grunt webpack

livePreview.serve_setup_cmd: export NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' && npx jambo build && grunt webpack
